analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0xe153bbfbd0dc32dfe390ece4815a77c39100108d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/22/0xe153bbfbd0dc32dfe390ece4815a77c39100108d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/22/0xe153bbfbd0dc32dfe390ece4815a77c39100108d.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
